mergewith.subtemplate:
<plugin spec='SiteModel' id="SiteModel.s:$(n)" gammaCategoryCount='0'> <!--substModel will be automatically detected /--> <proportionInvariant spec='parameter.RealParameter' id='proportionInvariant.s:$(n)' value='0.0' lower='0' upper='1' estimate='false'/> <mutationRate spec='parameter.RealParameter' id='mutationRate.s:$(n)' value='1.0' estimate='false'/> <shape spec='parameter.RealParameter' id='gammaShape.s:$(n)' value='1.0' estimate='false'/> </plugin> <prior id='MutationRatePrior.s:$(n)' x='@mutationRate.s:$(n)'><distr spec="OneOnX"/></prior> <prior id='GammaShapePrior.s:$(n)' x='@gammaShape.s:$(n)'><distr spec="beast.base.inference.distribution.Exponential" mean='1'/></prior> <prior id='PropInvariantPrior.s:$(n)' x='@proportionInvariant.s:$(n)'><distr spec="beast.base.inference.distribution.Uniform" lower='0' upper='1'/></prior>
<operator id="proportionInvariantScaler.s:$(n)" spec="beast.base.inference.operator.kernel.BactrianIntervalOperator" scaleFactor="0.75" weight="0.1" parameter="@proportionInvariant.s:$(n)"/> <operator id="mutationRateScaler.s:$(n)" spec="beast.base.evolution.operator.kernel.BactrianScaleOperator" scaleFactor="0.75" weight="0.1" parameter="@mutationRate.s:$(n)"/> <operator id="gammaShapeScaler.s:$(n)" spec="beast.base.evolution.operator.kernel.BactrianScaleOperator" scaleFactor="0.75" weight="0.1" parameter="@gammaShape.s:$(n)"/>
Prior on gamma shape for gene s:$(n) Prior on proportion invariant for gene s:$(n) Prior on gene tree relative mutation rate for gene s:$(n)
Scales proportion of invariant sites parameter of partition $(n)
Scales mutation rate of partition s:$(n)
Scales gamma shape parameter of partition s:$(n)

<plugin spec='HKY' id='hky.s:$(n)'> <parameter id="kappa.s:$(n)" name='kappa' value="2.0" lower="0.0" estimate='true'/> <frequencies id='estimatedFreqs.s:$(n)' estimate='true' spec='Frequencies'> <frequencies id='freqParameter.s:$(n)' spec='parameter.RealParameter' dimension='4' value='0.25' lower='0' upper='1'/> </frequencies> </plugin>
<prior id='KappaPrior.s:$(n)' x='@kappa.s:$(n)'> <distr spec="LogNormalDistributionModel" meanInRealSpace='false'> <parameter name='M' value="1.0" estimate='false'/> <parameter name='S' value="1.25" estimate='false'/> </distr> </prior> <prior id='FrequenciesPrior.s:$(n)' x='@freqParameter.s:$(n)'><distr spec="beast.base.inference.distribution.Uniform" lower='0' upper='1'/></prior>
<plugin id="KappaScaler.s:$(n)" spec="beast.base.evolution.operator.kernel.BactrianScaleOperator" scaleFactor="0.75" weight="0.1" parameter="@kappa.s:$(n)"/> <plugin id="FrequenciesExchanger.s:$(n)" spec="DeltaExchangeOperator" delta="0.2" weight="0.1" parameter="@freqParameter.s:$(n)"/>
HKY transition-transversion parameter of partition s:$(n)
Scale HKY transition-transversion parameter of partition s:$(n)
Exchange values of frequencies of partition s:$(n)

<plugin spec='TN93' id='tn93.s:$(n)'> <parameter id="kappa1.s:$(n)" name='kappa1' value="2.0" lower="0.0" estimate='true'/> <parameter id="kappa2.s:$(n)" name='kappa2' value="2.0" lower="0.0" estimate='true'/> <frequencies id='estimatedFreqs.s:$(n)' spec='Frequencies'> <frequencies id='freqParameter.s:$(n)' spec='parameter.RealParameter' dimension='4' value='0.25' lower='0' upper='1'/> </frequencies> </plugin>
<plugin id="kappa1Scaler.s:$(n)" spec="beast.base.evolution.operator.kernel.BactrianScaleOperator" scaleFactor="0.75" weight="0.1" parameter="@kappa1.s:$(n)"/> <plugin id="kappa2Scaler.s:$(n)" spec="beast.base.evolution.operator.kernel.BactrianScaleOperator" scaleFactor="0.75" weight="0.1" parameter="@kappa2.s:$(n)"/> <plugin id="FrequenciesExchanger.s:$(n)" spec="DeltaExchangeOperator" delta="0.2" weight="0.1" parameter="@freqParameter.s:$(n)"/>
<prior id='kappa1Prior.s:$(n)' x='@kappa1.s:$(n)'> <distr spec="LogNormalDistributionModel" meanInRealSpace='false'> <parameter name='M' value="1.0" estimate='false'/> <parameter name='S' value="1.25" estimate='false'/> </distr> </prior> <prior id='kappa2Prior.s:$(n)' x='@kappa2.s:$(n)'> <distr spec="LogNormalDistributionModel" meanInRealSpace='false'> <parameter name='M' value="1.0" estimate='false'/> <parameter name='S' value="1.25" estimate='false'/> </distr> </prior> <prior id='FrequenciesPrior.s:$(n)' x='@freqParameter.s:$(n)'><distr spec="beast.base.inference.distribution.Uniform" lower='0' upper='1'/></prior>
Scale TN93 kappa1 (rateAG) parameter of partition s:$(n)
Scale TN93 kappa2 (rateCT) parameter of partition s:$(n)
Exchange values of frequencies of partition s:$(n)
TN93 kappa1 (rateAG) parameter of partition s:$(n)
TN93 kappa2 (rateCT) parameter of partition s:$(n)

subtemplate.hmc: gtr/rateGT/, gtr/frequencies/, gtr/rateAT/, gtr/rateAC/, gtr/rateCG/, gtr/rateAG/, gtr/rateCT/, RateACPrior/index/=Priors/RateGTRPrior/, RateAGPrior/index/=Priors/RateGTRPrior/, RateATPrior/index/=Priors/RateGTRPrior/, RateCGPrior/index/=Priors/RateGTRPrior/, RateCTPrior/index/=Priors/RateGTRPrior/, RateGTPrior/index/=Priors/RateGTRPrior/, RateACScaler/index/=Operators/BactrianRateScaler/index/, RateAGScaler/index/=Operators/BactrianRateScaler/index/, RateATScaler/index/=Operators/BactrianRateScaler/index/, RateCGScaler/index/=Operators/BactrianRateScaler/index/, RateCTScaler/index/=Operators/BactrianRateScaler/index/, RateGTScaler/index/=Operators/BactrianRateScaler/index/

mergewith.subtemplate:
<plugin spec='GTR' id='gtr.s:$(n)'> <parameter id="rateAC.s:$(n)" name='rateAC' value="1.0" lower="0.0" estimate='true'/> <parameter id="rateAG.s:$(n)" name='rateAG' value="1.0" lower="0.0" estimate='true'/> <parameter id="rateAT.s:$(n)" name='rateAT' value="1.0" lower="0.0" estimate='true'/> <parameter id="rateCG.s:$(n)" name='rateCG' value="1.0" lower="0.0" estimate='true'/> <parameter id="rateCT.s:$(n)" name='rateCT' value="1.0" lower="0.0" estimate='false'/> <parameter id="rateGT.s:$(n)" name='rateGT' value="1.0" lower="0.0" estimate='true'/> <frequencies id='estimatedFreqs.s:$(n)' spec='Frequencies'> <frequencies id='freqParameter.s:$(n)' spec='parameter.RealParameter' dimension='4' value='0.25' lower='0' upper='1'/> </frequencies> </plugin>
<operator id="RateACScaler.s:$(n)" spec="beast.base.evolution.operator.kernel.BactrianScaleOperator" scaleFactor="0.75" weight="0.1" parameter="@rateAC.s:$(n)"/> <operator id="RateAGScaler.s:$(n)" spec="beast.base.evolution.operator.kernel.BactrianScaleOperator" scaleFactor="0.75" weight="0.1" parameter="@rateAG.s:$(n)"/> <operator id="RateATScaler.s:$(n)" spec="beast.base.evolution.operator.kernel.BactrianScaleOperator" scaleFactor="0.75" weight="0.1" parameter="@rateAT.s:$(n)"/> <operator id="RateCGScaler.s:$(n)" spec="beast.base.evolution.operator.kernel.BactrianScaleOperator" scaleFactor="0.75" weight="0.1" parameter="@rateCG.s:$(n)"/> <operator id="RateCTScaler.s:$(n)" spec="beast.base.evolution.operator.kernel.BactrianScaleOperator" scaleFactor="0.75" weight="0.1" parameter="@rateCT.s:$(n)"/> <operator id="RateGTScaler.s:$(n)" spec="beast.base.evolution.operator.kernel.BactrianScaleOperator" scaleFactor="0.75" weight="0.1" parameter="@rateGT.s:$(n)"/> <operator id="FrequenciesExchanger.s:$(n)" spec="DeltaExchangeOperator" delta="0.2" weight="0.1" parameter="@freqParameter.s:$(n)"/>
<prior id='RateACPrior.s:$(n)' x='@rateAC.s:$(n)'><distr spec="beast.base.inference.distribution.Gamma"><parameter name="alpha" value='0.05' estimate='false'/><parameter name="beta" value='10.0' estimate='false'/></distr></prior> <prior id='RateAGPrior.s:$(n)' x='@rateAG.s:$(n)'><distr spec="beast.base.inference.distribution.Gamma"><parameter name="alpha" value='0.05' estimate="false"/><parameter name="beta" value='20.0' estimate="false"/></distr></prior> <prior id='RateATPrior.s:$(n)' x='@rateAT.s:$(n)'><distr spec="beast.base.inference.distribution.Gamma"><parameter name="alpha" value='0.05' estimate="false"/><parameter name="beta" value='10.0' estimate="false"/></distr></prior> <prior id='RateCGPrior.s:$(n)' x='@rateCG.s:$(n)'><distr spec="beast.base.inference.distribution.Gamma"><parameter name="alpha" value='0.05' estimate="false"/><parameter name="beta" value='10.0' estimate="false"/></distr></prior> <prior id='RateCTPrior.s:$(n)' x='@rateCT.s:$(n)'><distr spec="beast.base.inference.distribution.Gamma"><parameter name="alpha" value='0.05' estimate="false"/><parameter name="beta" value='20.0' estimate="false"/></distr></prior> <prior id='RateGTPrior.s:$(n)' x='@rateGT.s:$(n)'><distr spec="beast.base.inference.distribution.Gamma"><parameter name="alpha" value='0.05' estimate="false"/><parameter name="beta" value='10.0' estimate="false"/></distr></prior>
<prior id='FrequenciesPrior.s:$(n)' x='@freqParameter.s:$(n)'><distr spec="beast.base.inference.distribution.Uniform" lower='0' upper='1'/></prior>
GTR A-C substitution parameter of partition s:$(n)
GTR A-G substitution parameter of partition s:$(n)
GTR A-T substitution parameter of partition s:$(n)
GTR C-G substitution parameter of partition s:$(n)
GTR C-T substitution parameter of partition s:$(n)
GTR G-T substitution parameter of partition s:$(n)
Exchange values of frequencies of partition s:$(n)
Scale GTR A-C substitution parameter of partition s:$(n)
Scale GTR A-G substitution parameter of partition s:$(n)
Scale GTR A-T substitution parameter of partition s:$(n)
Scale GTR C-G substitution parameter of partition s:$(n)
Scale GTR C-T substitution parameter of partition s:$(n)
Scale GTR G-T substitution parameter of partition s:$(n)

<plugin id='MutationDeathModel.s:$(n)' spec='beast.base.evolution.substitutionmodel.MutationDeathModel'> <parameter name='deathprob' id='deathprob.s:$(n)' value='0.1' estimate='false'/> <frequencies id='freqs.s:$(n)' spec='Frequencies'> <frequencies spec='parameter.RealParameter' value='1 0'/> </frequencies> </plugin>
<frequencies id='estimatedFreqs.s:$(n)' spec='Frequencies'> <frequencies id='freqParameter.s:$(n)' spec='parameter.RealParameter' dimension='4' value='0.25' lower='0' upper='1'/> </frequencies>
